#summary demonstration of how to import a database into a model
= Introduction =

This demo will show how to import an existing database into a RMBench model. We have SQLServer 2008 installed together with the AdventureWorks sample database. We start out with a new model, which we create from the project explorer (or any other eclipse view that allows creating new resources) using the "New" wizard:
